last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hyungtae’s unsettling confession catches Jihyo unawares, putting her in great danger. Bora chases after a mysterious flying object.

name: Glitch
overview: A young woman joins forces with a UFO enthusiast to investigate her boyfriend’s sudden disappearance and stumbles into a wild conspiracy.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Hong Jihyo tries her best to dismiss the return of the strange creature in her life, until its signal for attention becomes impossible to ignore.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Unable to find any sure leads to locate Lee Siguk, Jihyo turns to a community of UFO buffs where she's given a hostile welcome.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Huh Bora offers to help Jihyo as long as she's able to document the investigation for her video series. The two make their way to Siguk's apartment.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After getting into a tiff, the two friends go their separate ways. Jihyo turns to the police while Bora tails a suspicious real estate agent.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After a surprising find in a stolen hard drive, Jihyo and Bora sneak into the back of a car and end up near a secluded home.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Jihyo and Bora face a series of delays on the way to a psychiatric hospital. Kim Byungjo and Oh Sehee ask a former detective about a mass suicide case.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Moon Hyungtae tries to get information out of Jihyo by strapping her to a device that distorts the subconscious. Seo Hwajung attempts to meet her savior.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Jihyo revisits the site of the close encounter and turns to her family for more clues. Kim Chanwoo brings a hostage into Cafe Universe.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Preparations for the funeral are well underway until the Hosanna makes a surprise appearance. An old colleague reveals the details of Hyungtae's past.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Hyungtae’s unsettling confession catches Jihyo unawares, putting her in great danger. Bora chases after a mysterious flying object.
